sourcesContent: import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { ContractService } from "./services/contract.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.scss"], }) export class AppComponent { loader: boolean = false; constructor(private contractService: ContractService) { this.contractService.loader$.subscribe((value) => { this.loader = value; }); } title = "tic-tac-toe"; }
